entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6 except minus 11 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6 except minus 11 in low lying inland areas. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then northeast 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. Windy. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. Windy. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023
